title: Marbled Chocolate Orange Cake
ingredients: ['225g butter', '250g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250g natural yoghurt', '225g plain flour', '3/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons grated orange zest', '60g cooking chocolate, melted', '2 tablespoons orange liqueur', '2 tablespoons orange juice']
